description: A film to provoke discussion. With his son facing a drug charge from smoking marijuana, a father is faced with a dilemma: should he let events take their course or should he attempt to get his son off the hook? Cast: James Condon, Jessica Noad, Tony O'Malley Jones. Cinematography by Russell Boyd. Suitable for secondary school level.
